p: CBD oils were diluted with methanol and injected into the HPLC system. First, 5 mL of hemp seed oil was extracted with 20 mL methanol. After solvent evaporation, the samples were heated at 100 °C for 2 h. Subsequently, the samples were added to methanol and injected into the HPLC system. All the analyses were performed in triplicate, and the data are expressed as mean ± standard deviation.
